charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: ORDERED: dft imprisoned for 46 monthsl on Count 1 and 7 years on Count 2, to run concurrently; court recommends Englewood or Florence, Coloradoi; upon release dft placed on supervised release for five (5) years on each count to run concurrently; spec ial contions of probation; fine is waived; dft make restitition in the amount of $57,295 jointly and severally with co-dfts as follows: $50,000; to Colorado State Bank and $7,295 to St. Paul Fire and Marine Insurance; interest waived; dft pay $100 on each count for a total of $200 to CVF; dft remanded; dft advised of right to appeal; government's mtn to dimiss the Indictment against this dft only is granted

ORDERED: dft imprisoned for 46 monthsl on Count 1 and 7 years on Count 2, to run concurrently; court recommends Englewood or Florence, Coloradoi; upon release dft placed on supervised release for five (5) years on each count to run concurrently; spec ial contions of probation; fine is waived; dft make restitition in the amount of $57,295 jointly and severally with co-dfts as follows: $50,000; to Colorado State Bank and $7,295 to St. Paul Fire and Marine Insurance; interest waived; dft pay $100 on each count for a total of $200 to CVF; dft remanded; dft advised of right to appeal; government's mtn to dimiss the Indictment against this dft only is granted

charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: deft shall be impr. for 46 mos. on ct. 3; 84 mos. on ct. 2 consec.; 5 yrs. sup. rel. on cts. 2 &; 3 concur.; deft shall participate in the collection of a DNA sample as dir. by p.o.; deft shall participate in a prog. of testing &; trtmt for drug abuse as dir. by p.o. and shall pay the costs; deft shall make restit. in amt. of $91,273.75 on ct. 2; restit. shall be made jointly &; severally w/co-defts Jason Williams in amt. of $57,295 and jointly &; severally w/co-deft Jason Jones as to ct. 3 in amt. of $#33,978.75 in installments of at least $150.00; $200 to CVF due immediately; deft remanded;

deft shall be impr. for 84 mos. on ct. 2s; Court Recommends that the BOP place the deft at FCI, Englewood, CO; 5 yrs. sup. rel.; deft shall participate in a prog. of testing &; trtmt for drug abuse as dir. by p.o. and shall pay the costs; $100 to CVF due immediately; deft shall make restit. in amt. of $57,295 in monthly payments of $100 jointly &; severally w/co-defts Jason Jones and Devaughn Hudley; deft remanded;
